title: Airlines are Struggling To Stay Afloat Amid The Pandemic
summary: Investors were particularly worried about Asian carriers, which had already been hurting because of the strong U.S. dollar and global economic slowdown. Asian airlines have borne the brunt of the pandemic, but the impact has also been significant in North America and Europe. The pandemic has also taken a toll on Cathay Pacific’s bottom line. Fortunately, the airline industry has been able to capitalize on other carriers’ cancellations and re-routings by providing them with additional seats on its planes.

var d=Object.defineProperty,h=Object.defineProperties;var u=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var s=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var o=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,i=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var l=(e,a,t)=>a in e?d(e,a,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[a]=t,r=(e,a)=>{for(var t in a||(a={}))o.call(a,t)&&l(e,t,a[t]);if(s)for(var t of s(a))i.call(a,t)&&l(e,t,a[t]);return e},c=(e,a)=>h(e,u(a));var p=(e,a)=>{var t={};for(var n in e)o.call(e,n)&&a.indexOf(n)<0&&(t[n]=e[n]);if(e!=null&&s)for(var n of s(e))a.indexOf(n)<0&&i.call(e,n)&&(t[n]=e[n]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var n=t,{components:e}=n,a=p(n,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,c(r(r({},layoutProps),a),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`With nearly 900 confirmed cases and more than 11,000 suspected ones, the world is still reeling from the impact of pandemic influenza. Airlines have been hit hard as apprehensive travelers steer clear of travel. In addition to cancellations and red-eye flights, airlines are grappling with empty seats on normally packed flights, steep drops in ticket prices, and a burst of unused plane leases. To make matters worse, the pandemic has taken its toll on their bottom line.
For example, Travelers Insurance recently announced that it will no longer provide insurance coverage for overseas workers at influenza-stricken companies. As a result, some airlines have cut back or ceased all services to areas affected by the flu, while others have re-negotiated lease contracts to reduce costs. Let\u2019s take a look at how pandemic influenza has affected specific airlines:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

var d=Object.defineProperty,p=Object.defineProperties;var f=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var i=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,n=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,a,t)=>a in e?d(e,a,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[a]=t,o=(e,a)=>{for(var t in a||(a={}))r.call(a,t)&&h(e,t,a[t]);if(i)for(var t of i(a))n.call(a,t)&&h(e,t,a[t]);return e},c=(e,a)=>p(e,f(a));var l=(e,a)=>{var t={};for(var s in e)r.call(e,s)&&a.indexOf(s)<0&&(t[s]=e[s]);if(e!=null&&i)for(var s of i(e))a.indexOf(s)<0&&n.call(e,s)&&(t[s]=e[s]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var s=t,{components:e}=s,a=l(s,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,c(o(o({},layoutProps),a),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("h2",null,"Air Asia"),mdx("p",null,`Airline stocks took a beating in the weeks after the first cases of the pandemic were confirmed in early October. Investors were particularly worried about Asian carriers, which had already been hurting because of the strong U.S. dollar and global economic slowdown.
AirAsia, one of Southeast Asia\u2019s largest low-cost carriers, was particularly hard hit when it announced plans to cancel flights to Thailand and China, which had become hotbeds of the outbreak.
AirAsia later scaled back the number of cancellations, but many of its Asian rivals have not been so fortunate. China Southern Airlines and China Eastern Airlines have both suspended flights to Mexico, where there have been more than 3500 confirmed cases.`),mdx("h2",null,"All Nippon Airways"),mdx("p",null,`While Asian airlines have borne the brunt of the pandemic, the impact has also been significant in North America and Europe. For example, All Nippon Airways, Asia\u2019s largest airline, has had to cancel about 20 percent of its international flights. To make matters worse, the carrier also had to halt operations to Mexico for about two weeks, as well as all flights to the United States.
Although the pandemic has caused significant disruptions to ANA\u2019s flight schedule, the carrier has noted that passenger demand has not been particularly soft. In fact, it says that it has been selling more tickets than usual for the winter season, which has traditionally been its busiest period.`),mdx("h2",null,"Cathay Pacific Airways"),mdx("p",null,`Like other carriers, Cathay Pacific Airways has had to cancel flights to areas affected by the flu. It has also had to cancel some flights within Asia, which has affected its cargo service. Cathay Pacific has also seen a decline in demand for flights to the United States, which accounts for about 25 percent of the carrier\u2019s business. To make matters worse, the pandemic has also taken a toll on Cathay Pacific\u2019s bottom line.
While the carrier says that it has not experienced significant drops in revenue, it has noted that its operating costs have increased as it has had to cancel flights and pay out more in refunds to passengers.`),mdx("h2",null,"Delta Air Lines"),mdx("p",null,`Like other carriers, Delta Air Lines has had to cancel flights to some of the areas affected by the pandemic. It has also had to reduce its service to Mexico, which is the epicenter of the outbreak. In some cases, the carrier has reduced the number of seats on flights to Mexico, while in others, it has canceled certain routes altogether.
Delta has also had to boost personnel on flights to Asia, which is another major hotbed of the pandemic. Because of the extra expenses, the carrier has had to revise its earnings forecast for the year. While Delta\u2019s stock price initially fell in October, it has since rebounded to pre-pandemic levels.`),mdx("h2",null,"Emirates Airlines"),mdx("p",null,`Emirates, one of the Middle East\u2019s largest airlines, has been another victim of the pandemic. It has had to cancel flights to Mexico City, as well as other cities in Central and South America. In some cases, the carrier has re-routed flights to other airports in the region, which has caused some delays and other inconveniences for passengers.
Emirates has also seen a decline in demand for flights to Asia, another hotbed of the outbreak. Although the pandemic has affected the carrier\u2019s operations, it has also provided it with an opportunity to strengthen its revenue stream.
Emirates has been able to capitalize on other carriers\u2019 cancellations and re-routings by providing them with additional seats on its planes.`),mdx("h2",null,"El Al Israel Airlines"),mdx("p",null,`El Al Israel Airlines, the country\u2019s largest carrier, was among the first to declare a partial suspension of service to affected areas. It has also had to cancel some flights to Asia, which is another major hotbed of the outbreak. To make matters worse, El Al has also had to contend with reduced demand for flights to Europe and North America.
El Al has also had to contend with a slew of sick passengers trying to get home, which has put a significant strain on the carrier\u2019s resources. To make matters worse, the pandemic has also taken a toll on the airline\u2019s bottom line.`),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"The airline industry has been one of the primary victims of the pandemic. While carriers have been able to partially offset the pandemic\u2019s impact by re-routing flights and reducing service to affected areas, they have also had to contend with significant drops in revenue and increased costs."),mdx("p",null,"Luckily, the pandemic appears to be coming to an end, which has allowed airlines to scale back their cancellations and other precautions they had to take during its peak. The post-pandemic period has also given airlines an opportunity to improve their operations and boost their bottom line by selling more seats on underutilized planes."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

In fact, according to statistics released by the U.S. Census Bureau in September of last year, there has never been a better time for first-time entrepreneurs. For example, between 2007 and 2016, the number of first-time entrepreneurs increased from 5.5 million to 6.1 million\u2014an increase of almost 11 percent in only nine years. If you\u2019re thinking about becoming a first-time entrepreneur, now is the perfect time to take that leap. With that said, starting your own business isn\u2019t easy. However, establishing a new company requires careful planning and preparation to ensure that your new venture is a success. relatedArticles.title: How to Overcome Procrastination and Boost Productivity

var f=Object.defineProperty,p=Object.defineProperties;var y=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var a=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,s=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var u=(e,o,t)=>o in e?f(e,o,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[o]=t,i=(e,o)=>{for(var t in o||(o={}))r.call(o,t)&&u(e,t,o[t]);if(a)for(var t of a(o))s.call(o,t)&&u(e,t,o[t]);return e},h=(e,o)=>p(e,y(o));var l=(e,o)=>{var t={};for(var n in e)r.call(e,n)&&o.indexOf(n)<0&&(t[n]=e[n]);if(e!=null&&a)for(var n of a(e))o.indexOf(n)<0&&s.call(e,n)&&(t[n]=e[n]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var n=t,{components:e}=n,o=l(n,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,h(i(i({},layoutProps),o),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`As soon as you start working, you feel like procrastinating. The idea of your project seems so fascinating that you can\u2019t wait to get back to it. Unfortunately, the time when you least want to work is exactly when you need to work.
Working feels like a burden and every task seems like an uphill struggle. You hate yourself for putting off something that is so beneficial for your future and your career. You\u2019re also terrified about what will happen if you don\u2019t finish this assignment by tomorrow. You don\u2019t want to fail the course, lose your scholarship and end up homeless somewhere in a strange city where none of your friends live. However, all of this seems much more appealing than getting back to work on the project again; it\u2019s even more appealing than thinking about how difficult life will be without the degree or scholarship at home.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Benefits of Keeping a Productivity Journal

If you fall into the second category, you\u2019re not alone. Many people struggle with productivity in their everyday lives, but it doesn\u2019t have to be that way. Keeping a productivity journal can help anyone become more productive by identifying areas for improvement and establishing new habits. Whether you struggle with staying organized or frequently lose track of time, keeping a journal can help. The right journal will also help you stay accountable to yourself and identify your weak spots for future reference. Read on to learn about the benefits of keeping a productivity journal and how keeping one can improve your life."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

How to Start an Online Business

It\u2019s also known as an e-commerce business, which means it sells goods or services online. An online business can be started from home or from an office space, depending on your preference and circumstances. Starting your own e-business doesn\u2019t require significant capital but it does require lots of work and planning. However, the rewards are worth it \u2013 entrepreneurs report higher levels of job satisfaction than employees in traditional businesses and the potential profits are far greater than with other types of business ventures. Here are some tips that will help you start your own e-business venture. This article will explain what an online business is, why start one now, what you need to get started, and how to begin your new venture."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Power of Time Blocking for Improved Productivity

var h=Object.defineProperty,y=Object.defineProperties;var l=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var a=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var s=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,u=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var r=(t,e,o)=>e in t?h(t,e,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):t[e]=o,n=(t,e)=>{for(var o in e||(e={}))s.call(e,o)&&r(t,o,e[o]);if(a)for(var o of a(e))u.call(e,o)&&r(t,o,e[o]);return t},c=(t,e)=>y(t,l(e));var d=(t,e)=>{var o={};for(var i in t)s.call(t,i)&&e.indexOf(i)<0&&(o[i]=t[i]);if(t!=null&&a)for(var i of a(t))e.indexOf(i)<0&&u.call(t,i)&&(o[i]=t[i]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var i=o,{components:t}=i,e=d(i,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,c(n(n({},layoutProps),e),{components:t,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Time blocking is a productivity technique that\u2019s been around for quite some time. Famous people like Marie Antoinette, Thomas Jefferson, and even Oprah have been utilizing this technique to achieve peak performance. However, most of us tend to overlook it as something boring or ineffective. But, in reality, time blocking is a surefire way to boost your productivity and increase your output.
Time blocking isn\u2019t just about scheduling your day with blocks of activities. It\u2019s all about keeping track of the amount of time you spend on specific tasks throughout the day. To do so, you should list down all the tasks you need to complete during that specific day and allocate a dedicated time slot for each activity you want to finish by the end of that day.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The 5 Essential Steps to Starting a Successful Business

You get to be your own boss, set your own hours, and create something new. It\u2019s also scary, challenging, and often times riddled with uncertainty. Starting a business requires dedication, hard work, discipline, and stamina. In fact, most businesses fail within the first five years of operation.There are many reasons why businesses fail. Often it\u2019s because the owners didn\u2019t understand the market they were entering or underestimated how much time and money it would take to get their company off the ground. Fortunately there are things you can do before even setting up a business that will increase your chances of success: creating a plan, developing a pitch, researching competitors, finding funding sources and creating an exit strategy are all essential steps to starting a successful business ("))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Start a Business on a Shoestring Budget

Whether you want to launch a small side business or branch into new territory as an established company, you\u2019ll need a financial plan to get started. Small business budgets are essential for accounting, planning and monitoring of spending\u2014and they can help you get your company off the ground in no time. A budget enables you to set a monetary limit on the scope of your business venture. It also helps you stay within that limit, avoiding unnecessary expenses that may lead to bankruptcy. Your budget can be as simple or detailed as you like, but the basic framework is always the same. Here are some tips on how you can create an effective small business budget on a shoestring budget:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

After all, you only have a few employees, maybe even just one or two. Yet, you still see the potential for growth and expansion. Maybe you\u2019d like to bring in more clients, increase your visibility in your local area, hire new staff members or perhaps even expand into another location. Things are going smoothly at the moment, but how can you ensure that things continue to go in the right direction?
Small businesses often face unique challenges when it comes to growing and expanding. As an entrepreneur, you might be juggling a lot of responsibilities as well as managing multiple tasks in order to keep your company running smoothly on a daily basis. Here are some tips for growing your small business:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
